skills.text: R, place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area : Red ＜General Rilldo＞ with an energy cost of 5 or more. (Play this card on top of the specified card)
cost: place 1 card from your hand in the Drop Area

skills.text: Place 1 {Planet M-2} from your hand or Battle Area in the Drop Area : Draw 2 cards. Then, choose your opponent's Leader Card, and it loses -5000 power for the duration of the turn. Then, choose all of your opponent's Battle Cards, and they lose -10000 power for the duration of the turn.
cost: place 1 {Planet M-2} from your hand in the Drop Area
